name: Xcode Core Data Model File
summary: Learn about .XCDATAMODEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Core Data is a persistence framework that allows developers to interact with a data source using a high level data model in the source code.

description: Developer file created by Xcode, Apple's development software for iOS and Mac OS X; saved within an .XCDATAMODELD (with a trailing "D") package and saves the data model, or schema used by the application; created when the developer enables a Core Data Model for an Xcode project.
